meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, TX

agenda_items.title: Approval of October 16, 2023 Transportation and Infrastructure Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: DART Operations Update- 40 Proud. 40 Forward
agenda_items.description: Update on DART operations presented by the Executive Vice President and Chief of DART Police.

agenda_items.title: Update on City of Dallas Transportation vision
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the transportation vision, KBHCCD Master plan, Sidewalk Masterplan, and Transit oriented joint development.

agenda_items.title: Vision Zero Progress Report Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the progress of the Vision Zero initiative.

agenda_items.title: CRUISE Autonomous Vehicles: Follow up
agenda_items.description: Follow up from previous meetings regarding autonomous vehicles.

agenda_items.title: Monthly Update of Public Works Program Performance - October 2023
agenda_items.description: Monthly performance update from the Department of Public Works.
